summary: This document is a forwarded email from Judge Alison J. Nathan's chambers attaching an order on the defense's motion regarding Federal Rule of Evidence 412 in the case U.S. v. Maxwell. The order was issued on October 15, 2021, and was to be filed on the public docket on the following Monday.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: Issued the memo endorsement on the defense's motion regarding FRE 412 in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Listed as a recipient of the email from Judge Nathan's chambers regarding the order on the defense's motion.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Listed as a recipient of the email from Judge Nathan's chambers regarding the order on the defense's motion.

connections.description: Judge Nathan issued a court order to defense attorney Menninger in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.
Judge Nathan issued a court order to defense attorney Pagliuca in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.
Both are defense attorneys for Ghislaine Maxwell in the U.S. v. Maxwell case, receiving the same court order.

events.title: Judge Nathan Issues Order on FRE 412 Motion
events.description: Judge Alison J. Nathan issued a memo endorsement on the defense's motion regarding Federal Rule of Evidence 412 in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.

keyFacts: Judge Alison J. Nathan issued an order on the defense's motion regarding Federal Rule of Evidence 412 in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.
The order was issued on October 15, 2021, and was to be filed on the public docket on the following Monday.
The email was sent to defense attorneys Laura Menninger and Jeff Pagliuca, indicating they are part of Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team.
